settings.content: Enter the web address of your social media pages to have the links appear

settings.label: RSS
settings.info: Select a blog to link to an RSS feed

settings.content: To include an instagram feed on your site you will need a client id. You can get a client id by registering a new Instagram API client app at [http://instagram.com/developer/clients/register/](http://instagram.com/developer/clients/register/)
